name: Mush and Bounce
description:
--- How to play: ---

Somehow, your forest has been invaded by absolutely stationary beams! Use your mushroom capabilities to break through the bricks using spores and a variety of powerups! 

--- Controls: ---

WSAD / Arrow Keys -> move

Z / X / K / L -> Jump

--- Credits: --- 

Development: True Narwhak

Game name: VoidWalker

Color palette: PEAR36 by PINETREEPIZZA
